subject: Baseball
Divorce, Separations and Annulments
lead_paragraph: It was a big day for the Dodgers: the divorce trial of their owner began and the club let the slugger Manny Ramirez go on a waiver claim.
snippet: It was a big day for the Dodgers: the divorce trial of their owner began and the club let the slugger Manny Ramirez go on a waiver claim.
